alter session set "_ORACLE_SCRIPT"=TRUE;
CREATE USER ASESOFTWARE IDENTIFIED BY asesoftware;
GRANT CREATE SESSION TO ASESOFTWARE WITH ADMIN OPTION;

-- ASESOFTWARE.CLIENTE definition

-- DDL generated by DBeaver
-- WARNING: It may differ from actual native database DDL

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE ASESOFTWARE.CLIENTE;

CREATE TABLE ASESOFTWARE.CLIENTE (
	ID NUMBER,
	NOMBRE VARCHAR2(200),
	CONSTRAINT CLIENTE_PK PRIMARY KEY (ID)
);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX CLIENTE_PK ON ASESOFTWARE.CLIENTE (ID);


-- ASESOFTWARE.TAREA definition

-- DDL generated by DBeaver
-- WARNING: It may differ from actual native database DDL

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE ASESOFTWARE.TAREA;

CREATE TABLE ASESOFTWARE.TAREA (
	ID NUMBER,
	NOMBRE VARCHAR2(250),
	DESCRIPCION VARCHAR2(1000),
	TIEMPO NUMBER,
	UNIDAD_TIEMPO VARCHAR2(1),
	TAREA_PADRE_ID NUMBER,
	ESTADO VARCHAR2(1),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008315 CHECK ("NOMBRE" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008316 CHECK ("DESCRIPCION" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008317 CHECK ("TIEMPO" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008320 CHECK ("ESTADO" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008321 CHECK ("TAREA_PADRE_ID" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008322 CHECK ("UNIDAD_TIEMPO" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT TAREA_PK PRIMARY KEY (ID),
	CONSTRAINT FK_TAREA_PADRE FOREIGN KEY (TAREA_PADRE_ID) REFERENCES ASESOFTWARE.TAREA(ID)
);


-- ASESOFTWARE.CLIENTE_X_TAREA definition

-- DDL generated by DBeaver
-- WARNING: It may differ from actual native database DDL

-- Drop table

-- DROP TABLE ASESOFTWARE.CLIENTE_X_TAREA;

CREATE TABLE ASESOFTWARE.CLIENTE_X_TAREA (
	ID NUMBER,
	CLIENTE_ID NUMBER,
	TAREA_ID NUMBER,
	TIEMPO NUMBER,
	ESTADO VARCHAR2(1),
	CONSTRAINT CLIENTE_X_TAREA_PK PRIMARY KEY (ID),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008323 CHECK ("ID" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008324 CHECK ("CLIENTE_ID" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008325 CHECK ("TAREA_ID" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008326 CHECK ("TIEMPO" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT SYS_C008327 CHECK ("ESTADO" IS NOT NULL),
	CONSTRAINT FK_CLIENTE FOREIGN KEY (CLIENTE_ID) REFERENCES ASESOFTWARE.CLIENTE(ID),
	CONSTRAINT FK_TAREA FOREIGN KEY (TAREA_ID) REFERENCES ASESOFTWARE.TAREA(ID)
);
